body_html:
but we dont pass -mavx2 on all files. We only pass them on specific files covered by the runtime-dispatch codepaths.

Follow C_AVX2_FOUND in the TH/CMakeLists.txt file and you'll see that only vector/AVX2.c and generic/simd/convolve.c are given the flag.
body_text:
but we dont pass -mavx2 on all files. We only pass them on specific files covered by the runtime-dispatch codepaths.
Follow C_AVX2_FOUND in the TH/CMakeLists.txt file and you'll see that only vector/AVX2.c and generic/simd/convolve.c are given the flag.
body:
but we dont pass `-mavx2` on all files. We only pass them on specific files covered by the runtime-dispatch codepaths.

Follow `C_AVX2_FOUND` in the TH/CMakeLists.txt file and you'll see that only `vector/AVX2.c` and `generic/simd/convolve.c` are given the flag.
